annotations:
NORVIC HANDY - TONNAGE
+++++++++++++++++++++++
AUS / NZ :
MV AFRICAN RAIL - OPEN NEW PLYMOUTH 2-9 SEP 2024
BOD : VLSFO ABOUT 500MT / LSMGO ABOUT 150 MT
MV AFRICAN RAIL
FULLY FITTED LOGGER
BUILT: 2015 / FLAG: LIBERIA / CLASS: LR
39,783 MT DWT ON 10.70 M SSW / TPC 51.7
LOA/BEAM: 179.99 M (LOA) / 30.00 M (BEAM) INT'L TONNAGE: 24,785 GT / 13,022 NT
GRAIN/BALE: 1,727,186 CUFT (INC HATCHWAY) / 1,666,162 CUFT (INC HATCHWAY)
HO/HA: 5/5
HATCHCOVER: TTS TRANSFOLDING – HYDRAULIC
GEARS: 4X36T CRANES
LOG FITTED/CO2 FITTED.
LADEN. : ABT 13.5 KTS ON VLSFO 24.0 MT + LSMGO 0.1 MT AT SEA.
BALLAST: ABT 14.0 KTS ON VLSFO 22.5 MT + LSMGO 0.1 MT AT SEA.
PORT IDLE: 2.5MTS VLSFO.
PORT WORKING: 4.5MTS VLSFO.
ECO FOR GUIDANCE PURPOSES ONLY WOG.
LADEN.  : ABT 12.0 KTS ON VLSFO 18.0 MT + LSMGO 0.1 MT AT SEA.
BALLAST : ABT 12.0 KTS ON VLSFO 16.5 MT + LSMGO 0.1 MT AT SEA.
ALL SPEEDS AND CONSUMPTIONS VALID UP TO AND INCLUDING BEAUFORT FORCE 4 AND TOTAL COMBINED (SEA AND SWELL) SIGNIFICANT WAVE HEIGHT CONFINED TO LIMITS OF DOUGLAS SEA STATE 3 WITH NO ADVERSE CURRENTS. IT IS UNDERSTOOD THAT THE TIME DURING WHICH THERE IS BAD WEATHER WITH WIND EXCEEDING BEAUFORT FORCE 4 AND/OR DOUGLAS SEA STATE 3 UNDER OPPOSING CURRENT WILL NOT BE TAKEN INTO CONSIDERATION FOR THE CALCULATION OF THE PERFORMANCE.
THE WORD “ABOUT” IN SPEED AND CONSUMPTION REFERS TO AN ALLOWANCE OF +/- 0.5 KNOTS AND +/- 5% ON BUNKER CONSUMPTION RESPECTIVELY. AT ALL TIMES DURING THE CURRENCY OF THE CHARTER, THE VESSEL SHALL BE CAPABLE OF STEAMING AT THE RATE OF KNOTS AND ON THE CONSUMPTION OF FUEL OIL AS DESCRIBED AND GUARANTEED IN THE VESSEL’S DESCRIPTION IN GOOD WEATHER CONDITIONS. IN THIS CHARTER, THE WORDS ‘’GOOD WEATHER CONDITIONS’’ SHALL MEAN WIND SPEEDS OF UP TO AND INCLUDING BEAUFORT FORCE 4 AND UP TO AND INCLUDING DOUGLAS SEA STATE 3.
ALL ABOVE FIGURES ARE “ABOUT” AND GIVEN IN GOOD FAITH.
Thanks and best regards,
Satheesh Jegadeeswaren | Senior Manager, Chartering
Tel: +91-22-6813-6041 | Cell: 91-813-039-5896| Email: handy.pacific@norvicshipping.com
